Abdulbari Belouafi

Abdulbari holds an MSc in advanced mechanical engineering from the University of Birmingham specialising in engineering design using CAD and CFD software. Furthermore, he is highly capable in report writing and simplifying technical language for all stakeholders involved in this project.
